summary: The module provides pytest fixtures and a collection of unit test cases aimed at validating AWS IoT Certificate Authority (CA) management operations—such as deletion, description, registration, listing, updating, and retrieving registration codes—by leveraging boto3 with the Moto library to mock AWS services.
business_intent: Validate that IoT CA certificate workflows behave correctly and handle error conditions when interacting with the AWS IoT service, supporting reliable certificate lifecycle management.
